title: Could we get some data?
body:
Like how the new runes effected: Damage, Deaths per game, Tanks survive ability vs bruisers and etc... game length changes, class damage, itemization purchases and the likes. 

It would be really nice to know how this has changed since last season, other things I especially want to know if we could see additional support/tank rune trees/ options because of damage getting 3 trees, and how data compares with current expectations.

replies.body: I wish I did, but we poros in H&S aren't going to have any of this kind of data. I'd suggest posting this over in Gameplay for the best chance of getting that data from the devs.

You just took the bait on both of my threads! Thanks again for your time, gameplay (seems to have) low notice-ability by devs it seems, because they don't take the bait/too many threads. Any chance of passing on that some of the players might like to see this data when it becomes available?
I can certainly do my best, but tbh I'm not sure I will ever come across that type of detailed data =\ . I'll definitely be sure to poke someone to see if they can hop over to discuss this stuff.

It's most likely going to take a few more patches before they release anything like this on Nexus.

So far we've had the patch a week which isnt enough time to get a large enough sample size, taking into account any changes to come out next patch as such.
